alert.note: Alert for Toa Alta (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 05 at 7:15PM AST until February 05 at 9:00PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for... Toa Alta Municipality in Puerto Rico... * Until 915 PM AST. * At 713 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain that will cause urban and small stream flooding in the advisory area. Emergency managers reported urban flooding in some areas. Up to 4 inches of rain have fallen and an additional inch of rain is possible. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Toa Alta.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. A Flood Advisory means river or stream flows are elevated, or ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
